component.name: JJazzLab
component.summary: Generate backing tracks for any song

description.p: Fed up with boring backing tracks? Try JJazzLab and make your own dynamic backing tracks in just a few minutes!
"Love it, works as expected, bow, thanks to the author", "Absolutely fantastic app!" (YouTube comments)

ul.li: Dynamic backing tracks - Start a solo slowly and gradually build up the atmosphere.
Rhythmic accents - Use chord anticipations and rhythmic accents to spice up the arrangement.
Benefit from 1000's of free Yamaha style files - JJazzLab can read Yamaha style files. It also introduces new extension files for even more style variations.

A simple and powerful user interface - Type in a few chord symbols, pick up a rhythm, and press start, itâ€™s a matter of seconds. Need more? Introduce rhythm and intensity variations, custom bass phrases, etc.
An open platform for developers - Leverage the JJazzLab open-source code to add features and new music generation capabilities via plugins.
